definition: trouble spot/sketchy area
is/are/am/yes/to be

to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: I decided to get out of sight as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我決定儘快離開是非之地。

sentences.english: This is the Chinese unique place is apt to get into trouble.
sentences.chinese: 這就是中國特有的是非之地。

sentences.english: Who knows the land that this public place of entertainment is dispute however.
sentences.chinese: 誰知這家娛樂場所卻是是非之地。
